name: Air Max 270
short_description: Ultimate comfort and style in every step.
long_description: The Nike Air Max 270 offers a super-soft ride that feels as impossible as it looks. With the first-ever Max Air unit that bends with the grooves in your forefoot, it's not only comfortable, it also moves with your every step.

name: Dri-FIT Training T-Shirt
short_description: Stay dry and comfortable during intense workouts.
long_description: The Nike Dri-FIT Training T-Shirt is designed with moisture-wicking technology to help keep you dry and comfortable during your toughest workouts. It's made from soft, breathable fabric that moves with you.

name: Flex Stride 2-in-1 Shorts
short_description: Versatile shorts with built-in support and storage.
long_description: The Nike Flex Stride 2-in-1 Shorts combine a supportive inner layer with a breathable outer layer to help you cover any distance. The inner shorts have a compressive feel, while the outer shorts deliver lightweight coverage.

name: Brasilia Backpack
short_description: Spacious and durable backpack for everyday use.
long_description: The Nike Brasilia Backpack is designed for secure storage with a large compartment and small-item pockets inside and out. Its ultra-durable design features padded shoulder straps for comfort on the go.

name: Ultraboost 21
short_description: Unmatched comfort and energy return for your runs.
long_description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 is all about maximizing comfort and energy return in your stride. It features a responsive Boost midsole and a Primeknit+ upper that adapts to your foot's shape, giving you a personalized fit.

name: Essentials 3-Stripes T-Shirt
short_description: Classic style for everyday wear.
long_description: The Adidas Essentials 3-Stripes T-Shirt is a versatile wardrobe staple. It features the iconic 3-Stripes design and a comfortable cotton construction that's perfect for everyday wear.

name: Tiro 19 Training Pants
short_description: Breathable pants for intense training sessions.
long_description: The Adidas Tiro 19 Training Pants are designed to keep you cool and dry during intense training sessions. They feature moisture-wicking fabric and ventilated panels for maximum breathability.

name: Classic Backpack
short_description: Timeless style with ample storage space.
long_description: The Adidas Classic Backpack is a versatile and durable choice for everyday use. It offers plenty of storage space and features a clean, classic design that complements any outfit.

name: Ace Sneakers
short_description: Iconic sneakers with embroidered details.
long_description: The Gucci Ace Sneakers are instantly recognizable with their distinctive embroidered details. They're crafted from premium leather and feature a comfortable rubber sole for all-day wear.

name: GG Marmont Leather Belt Bag
short_description: Luxurious belt bag with iconic GG logo.
long_description: The Gucci GG Marmont Leather Belt Bag is a statement piece that combines style and functionality. It features the iconic GG logo and provides convenient storage for your essentials while on the go.

name: Oversized Square-frame Sunglasses
short_description: Chic sunglasses for a bold fashion statement.
long_description: The Gucci Oversized Square-frame Sunglasses exude glamour and sophistication. They feature oversized frames with gold-tone detailing, making them a must-have accessory for any fashion-forward individual.

name: G-Timeless Watch
short_description: Elegant timepiece with a modern twist.
long_description: The Gucci G-Timeless Watch combines timeless elegance with a contemporary edge. It features a sleek stainless steel case and a unique dial design that sets it apart from traditional watches.

name: Faux Leather Biker Jacket
short_description: Stylish faux leather jacket for a chic look.
long_description: The Zara Faux Leather Biker Jacket is a versatile piece that adds an edge to any outfit. Made from high-quality faux leather, it features classic biker details and a comfortable fit.

name: Ruffled Floral Print Dress
short_description: Elegant floral dress for a feminine touch.
long_description: The Zara Ruffled Floral Print Dress is a timeless piece that exudes femininity. It features a delicate floral print, ruffled details, and a flattering silhouette that's perfect for any special occasion.

name: Slim Fit Tailored Trousers
short_description: Sleek trousers for a polished look.
long_description: The Zara Slim Fit Tailored Trousers are a versatile addition to your wardrobe. They feature a slim, tailored fit and are made from high-quality fabric for a polished and refined look.

name: Structured Crossbody Bag
short_description: Chic and compact crossbody bag for on-the-go.
long_description: The Zara Structured Crossbody Bag is a stylish and practical choice for everyday use. It features a structured silhouette and a convenient crossbody strap, making it the perfect accessory for a busy lifestyle.

name: Cotton Jersey Top
short_description: Soft and comfortable jersey top for everyday wear.
long_description: The H&M Cotton Jersey Top is a versatile piece that offers both comfort and style. It's made from soft, breathable cotton and features a classic design that pairs well with any outfit.

name: Slim Fit Chinos
short_description: Classic chinos for a polished and refined look.
long_description: The H&M Slim Fit Chinos are a timeless addition to your wardrobe. They feature a slim, tailored fit and are made from high-quality fabric for a polished and refined look.

name: Canvas Sneakers
short_description: Casual canvas sneakers for a laid-back look.
long_description: The H&M Canvas Sneakers are a comfortable and versatile choice for casual wear. They feature a classic canvas upper and a durable rubber sole for all-day comfort.

name: Faux Leather Backpack
short_description: Stylish faux leather backpack for everyday use.
long_description: The H&M Faux Leather Backpack combines style and functionality. It features a sleek faux leather exterior and ample storage space, making it the perfect companion for your daily adventures.

name: 501 Original Fit Jeans
short_description: Timeless denim jeans for a classic look.
long_description: The Levi’s 501 Original Fit Jeans are a classic choice for a reason. They feature a straight leg and a mid-rise waist for a timeless look that pairs well with any outfit.

name: Graphic Logo T-shirt
short_description: Comfortable T-shirt with a classic Levi's logo.
long_description: The Levi’s Graphic Logo T-shirt is a comfortable and stylish choice for casual wear. It features the iconic Levi's logo and is made from soft, breathable fabric for all-day comfort.

name: Trucker Jacket
short_description: Iconic denim jacket for a timeless look.
long_description: The Levi’s Trucker Jacket is an iconic piece that never goes out of style. It features a classic denim construction and a comfortable fit, making it a versatile addition to your wardrobe.

name: Classic Leather Belt
short_description: Timeless leather belt for a polished look.
long_description: The Levi’s Classic Leather Belt is a versatile accessory that adds a finishing touch to any outfit. It's made from high-quality leather and features a classic buckle design for a timeless look.
